name: azure-commands
label: Azure Commands
description: Azure Commands are used to run Azure native commands for Azure resources configurations directly from FortiSOAR.

fields.title: Client ID
fields.name: client_id
fields.tooltip: Specify the Unique API ID of the Azure AD application that is used to create an authentication token required to access the API.
fields.description: Specify the Unique API ID of the Azure AD application that is used to create an authentication token required to access the API.

fields.title: Client Secret
fields.name: client_secret
fields.tooltip: Specify the Unique API Secret of the Azure AD application that is used to create an authentication token required to access the API.
fields.description: Specify the Unique API Secret of the Azure AD application that is used to create an authentication token required to access the API.

fields.title: Tenant ID
fields.name: tenant_id
fields.tooltip: Specify the ID of the tenant that you have been provided for your Azure Active Directory instance.
fields.description: Specify the ID of the tenant that you have been provided for your Azure Active Directory instance.

operations.title: Execute Azure Command
operations.description: Runs a generic Azure AZ command on the host with given parameters and values.

parameters.title: Command
parameters.name: command
parameters.description: Specify the Azure command to run on the host without the az. For example if you want to run az vm list, Specify 'vm list'
parameters.tooltip: Specify the Azure command to run on the host without the az. For example if you want to run az vm list, Specify 'vm list'

parameters.title: Optional Parameters
parameters.name: optional_parameters
parameters.description: Specify the optional command name and its value through which you want to filter the results. Ex: --show-details false
parameters.tooltip: Specify the optional command name and its value through which you want to filter the results. Ex: --show-details false

operations.title: Get Virtual Machines List
operations.description: List details of all VM information under the subscription on Microsoft Azure Platform .

parameters.title: Resource Group
parameters.name: resource_group
parameters.description: Specify the resource group name whose VM details you want to list.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the resource group name whose VM details you want to list.

parameters.title: Optional Parameters
parameters.name: optional_parameters
parameters.description: Specify the command name and its value through which you want to filter the results. Ex: --show-details false
parameters.tooltip: Specify the command name and its value through which you want to filter the results. Ex: --show-details false

operations.title: Get Virtual Machine
operations.description: Get details of a VM under the subscription on Microsoft Azure Platform by VM id and other parameters.

parameters.title: VM ID
parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the VM whose details you want to fetch.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the VM whose details you want to fetch.

parameters.title: Resource Group
parameters.name: resource_group
parameters.description: Specify the resource group name whose VM details you want to list.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the resource group name whose VM details you want to list.

parameters.title: Optional Parameters
parameters.name: optional_parameters
parameters.description: Specify the command name and its value through which you want to filter the results. Ex: --show-details false
parameters.tooltip: Specify the command name and its value through which you want to filter the results. Ex: --show-details false

operations.title: Delete Virtual Machine
operations.description: Delete a VM under the subscription on Microsoft Azure Platform on the basis of VM id and other parameters.

parameters.title: VM ID
parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Specify the ID of the VM which you want to delete.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of the VM which you want to delete.

parameters.title: Resource Group
parameters.name: resource_group
parameters.description: Specify the resource group name whose VM details you want to list.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the resource group name whose VM details you want to list.

parameters.title: Optional Parameters

parameters.description: Specify the command name and its value through which you want to filter the results. Ex: --show-details false
parameters.tooltip: Specify the command name and its value through which you want to filter the results. Ex: --show-details false
